name: Monstr
description:
Be a lover & a fighter in this Tinder-inspired deck-building rogue-like! Can you swipe your way to level 10 and beat the Vampire Queen?

NOTE: It is highly recommended you download this game instead of using WebGL, as WebGL is known to be buggier than a downloaded copy.

Character art with exception of the demon is currently placeholder as our character artist ran out of time with other commitments. Please enjoy as is :)

Instructions:

Swipe on enemies with a heart or a skull. A heart has a chance (shown on hover) to recruit the enemy to your side and let you use their ability.

Use Vibes in battle to power your attacks. Get vibes from cards! Keep a balance of attacking, defending, and vibe cards!

Level up by defeating enemies and gathering upgrades. Helpful NPCs may also show up along your journey to assist you!

Made in March 2021 for the 7DRL challenge.

UI art, music, code, design by Jet Simon

Character art by Ngan Hoang (https://nganhoang.ca/)
